name: Aya's Sneaky Scoop!
description:
Something scandalous is happening at the Scarlet Devil Mansion, but Aya only has room for one more picture! Find what's going on and make your shot count!

Controls (Keyboard): WASD to move, mouse to look around, space to jump, P to pause; hold Shift for camera mode, left click to take a picture while fully charged, scroll wheel to zoom in while in camera mode.

Controls (Controller): Left analog stick to move, right analog stick to look around, Triangle/Y (depending on controller) to jump, Start/Options (depending on your controller) to pause; hold L1 for camera mode, R1 to take a picture while fully charged, L2 and R2 to zoom while in camera mode.

Attributions:

  • Sakuya model made by アールビット, https://bowlroll.net/user/104281

  • Maid model made by
    トモジロ, https://bowlroll.net/user/149075
  • Broom model by JmPrsh153, https://sketchfab.com/models/3c16a94db7bd4ea8946896824a46b193
  • Camera charge sound effect by primeval_polypod, https://freesound.org/people/primeval_polypod/sounds/161002/

Design: Lillian Goulston, Boombott (Brian Botting), Brogrammist

Programming: Boombott (Brian Botting), Lillian Goulston

Art and Animation: Brogrammist

Models made for the gamecan be  found here: https://sketchfab.com/models/36873481ff5c4001aaafe2724bb1fc26

Music: Well
